title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or Docker pull; includes REST & Go APIs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings in chains, agents, RAG stacks.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, RAG, admin panel); drop-in replacement for ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping—available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Community npm package that wraps the Ollama REST API in a friendly CLI with chat & model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement—VS Code extension + local server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: Ollama + LangChain + Chroma; ingest PDFs and query in natural language.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVCs.

title: ollama-chat (React)
summary: Lightweight React chat component that streams answers from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Python Telegram bot that forwards messages to Ollama and streams replies; configurable per chat.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, embed, and model management; NuGet package.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Community Rust library focused on ergonomic chat completions and embeddings for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module that spins up Ollama containers for testing LLM-dependent code in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-qa-streamlit
summary: Streamlit demo app: upload documents, build vector index, and chat with Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-autogen
summary: Microsoft AutoGen sample showing how to use Ollama models as autonomous agents for group chat.
